examples.example: 我一直在思考自己想要过什么样的生活。

translate.english: I have been constantly thinking about what kind of life I want to live.

examples.example: 我在努力探索自己能成为什么样的人。

translate.english: I am trying hard to explore what kind of person I can become.

examples.example: 我在不断追寻着什么样的梦想才是最适合自己的。

translate.english: I am constantly in pursuit of what kind of dream is the most suitable for myself.
